property.name: hybrid.similarity.metric
property.description: either "jaccard" which is only for partitioning or "cosine"

property.name: hybrid.sim.threshold
property.description: this should be same as partitioning threshold

property.name: hybrid.block.number
property.description: PSS1,PSS2 note: PSS is PSS1 with hybrid.number.splits=1

property.name: hadoop.splitting.enabled
property.description: hadoop splitting files into mapred.min.split.size

property.name: hadoop.split.size
property.description: split size in MB per map if hybrid.hadoop.splitting is true

property.name: hybrid.S.size
property.description: number of vectors assigned to each map (aka.big S) if hadoop.splitting.enabled = false

property.name: hybrid.number.splits
property.description: Split S into this number of indexes (PSS1) otherwise 1=PSS.

property.name: hybrid.io.block
property.description: read other block size into B

property.name: hybrid.comp.block
property.description: process this number of vectors out of hybrid.io.block aka. b in SIGIR'13

property.name: hybrid.load.balancing
property.description: SIGIR'14 loadbalancing technique,0=none(ie.circular if set),1=step1,2=step2,3=step3,12=step1and2,13=step1and3,23=step2and3

property.name: partition.number.partitions
property.description: Static partitioning used from WSDM'13

property.name: hybrid.dot.partitions
property.description: Enable partitions level dot product (not published)

property.name: hybrid.circular.enable
property.description: enable load balacing through circular assignment (WSDM'13) applied before static partitioning skip

property.name: hybrid.google.skip
property.description: google dynamic skipping applied for only singleS/block-0 and change p.norm check

property.name: hybrid.partition.dot.vector
property.description: Enable partition vs. vector dot check for candidates.(not published)

property.name: hybrid.loops.loopb
property.description: Loop order for block-1 is loopS{loopB} when true otherwise,opposite if false.

property.name: hybrid.multi.threads
property.description: block-0 only, if multiple S is used then make it multi-thread

property.name: hybrid.exclude.myself
property.description: Each map does not compare with its own partition.

property.name: hybrid.single.map
property.description: run single map to compare its partition with the rest of the inputdata (ie. s-to-all)

property.name: hybrid.text.back
property.description: Convert binary final similarity results to readable text

property.name: hybrid.log.enable
property.description: Enables log priting for debugging
